results.deck: Video game company famous for their downloadable game PAIN.
results.description:
Overview

Located in Louisville, Colorado. Idol Minds is a independent game company. The are most famous for their downloadable game PAIN, which came out in 2007. 51 people are employed at Idol Minds.

Games

  • CoolBoarders 3 (1998)
  • Rally Cross 2 (1998)
  • SuperCross Circuit (1999)
  • My Street (2003)
  • Neopets - The Darkest Faerie (2005)
  • PAIN (2007)
  • Ruin (2011)
  • The Ratchet & Clank Trilogy (2012)
results.name: Idol Minds L.L.C.

concept.name: Letters Replaced by Numbers in Title
